column1: Little Goat Diner////OMG OMG OMG! This was a breakfast experience of a lifetime. I somehow stumbled on this restaurant yesterday after reading a story about the chef
column2: Stephanie Izzard. My waiter was Cameron who provided excellent service. He suggested the brioche French toast
column3: which turned out to be the best breakfast I've ever had
column4: and breakfast is my favorite restaurant meal.
